title: Enhance KinKong Trading Platform Interface
description: Implement comprehensive trading platform interface improvements to provide users with better insights, investment management, and strategy visualization.
objective: Create an intuitive and professional trading platform interface that enhances user experience and provides clear access to all trading functionalities.

features.title: Trading Dashboard
features.description: Create main dashboard showing portfolio overview, active positions, and key performance metrics

features.title: Investment Interface
features.description: Implement streamlined investment flow with wallet connection, USDC deposit, and position management

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Develop detailed performance tracking with historical data, charts, and profit distribution history

features.title: Trading Signals
features.description: Display real-time trading signals, market opportunities, and whale movement indicators

features.title: Strategy Visualization
features.description: Create interactive visualization of current trading strategy, risk management, and position sizing
